title: Solar Tablet
summaries: A Solar Tablet is a Hardmode consumable item used to summon a Solar Eclipse. It may only be used during the day, causing the eclipse to begin immediately, regardless of the time. The eclipse lasts only for the current day.

Solar Tablets can be found in <linked>Lihzahrd Chests</linked> in the <linked>Jungle Temple</linked>. Additionally, <linked>Lihzahrds</linked> and <linked>Flying Snakes</linked> have a chance of dropping a <linked>Solar Tablet Fragment</linked>, which can be used to craft a Solar Tablet.
